availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William Kash (Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace)

body.p: Breathitt County, Kentucky, farmer and justice of the peace. Montgomery County, Kentucky, native. Married to Sarah Kash. Father of Alfred Kash, Caleb Kash, Phoebe J. Kash, Polly Ann Kash, Elizabeth Kash, and Maranda Kash. Farmer in Breathitt County in 1860. Justice of the peace of Breathitt County in 1864.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Breathitt County, District 1, p. 94; KYR-0001-007-0308.
